name: Baby BFT
description: Baby BFT is a revolutionary cryptocurrency project that combines artificial intelligence with blockchain technology to create immersive gaming experiences, generative NFT tools, and social media interactions in the metaverse. Our ecosystem rewards users for participation, creativity, and engagement through play-to-earn mechanics, staking rewards, and AI-driven social features. Join the next wave of play-to-earn, NFTs, and AI-driven interactions powered by Baby BFT cryptocurrency
